fact-4.value: RomReal is a Company focused on the Romanian real estate market

fact-15.value: The consolidated financial statements of the RomReal Group and those of the parent company have been prepared in accordance with International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS) as issued by the International Accounting Standards Board (IASB), adopted by the EU. All IFRS standards adopted have effective date 1 January 2021 or earlier.
